briefTitle: Oncoliq: Early Breast Cancer Detection Based on Liquid Biopsies and microRNAs
officialTitle: Pilot Test for an Early Diagnosis Kit for Breast Cancer Based on Liquid Biopsies
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Breast Cancer, Breast Carcinoma
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients over 35 years old who visit the gynecological clinic for their annual mammographic check-up

Exclusion Criteria:

* Personal history of cancer
